Test.Name: Absolute move is supported for 'Pan Tilt', 'Zoom'
Test.Description:
GetCapabilities: supported Scope list contains onvif://www.onvif.org/Profile/Streaming Discovery feature: supported Discovery/Types/dn:NetworkVideoTransmitter feature: supported WS-Basic notification: supporetd NTP: Supported WS-Username token: supported MediaService: supported Real-Time Streaming feature: supported
!!! Before this test case make sure that DUT has dn:NetworkVideoTransmitter discovery type !!!

Test.Name: Correct response: one node with AbsolutePanTilt SphericalPositionSpace supporting
Profile with Limits (less than at options)
No Nodes with Pan/Tilt in GetNodes
Two profiles in GetProfiles - the 1st w/wrong NodeToken
2 nodes in GetNodes: 1st w/wrong URL in AbsolutePanTiltPositionSpace
Correct response: several spases are supported (SphericalPositionSpace and PositionGenericSpace)
Absolute Position Space description is incorrect
No Absolute Position Space for PanTilt in GetNodes
No PTZ in MediaProfile and no PTZConfigurations in GetConfigurations
